Plot: The adventures of an eccentric girl who has strange attitudes towards hygiene and sexuality longs for the reunion of her divorced parents.
Title: Wetlands
Writer: Claus Falkenberg (screenplay), David Wnendt (screenplay), Sabine Pochhammer, Charlotte Roche (novel)
Actors: Carla Juri, Christoph Letkowski, Marlen Kruse, Meret Becker
tomatoConsensus: While certainly not for the faint of heart, Wetlands transcends its shock value with sweetness, heart, and subversive wit.
